   16: 
   17: -module(metrics_roster_SUITE).
   18: -compile(export_all).
   19: 
   20: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: 
   24: -import(metrics_helper, [assert_counter/2,
   25:                       get_counter_value/1]).
   26: 
   27: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% Suite configuration
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: 
   31: all() ->
   32:     [{group, roster},
   33:      {group, subscriptions}
   34:     ].
   35: 
   36: groups() ->
   37:     [{roster, [sequence], roster_tests()},
   38:      {subscriptions, [sequence], subscription_tests()}
   39:     ].
   40: 
   41: suite() ->
   42:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}},
   43:      {required, ejabberd_node} | escalus:suite()].
   44: 
   45: roster_tests() -> [get_roster,
   46:                    add_contact,
   47:                    roster_push].
   48: 
   49: %%  WARNING: Side-effects & test interference
   50: %%  subscribe affects subsequent tests
   51: %%  by sending a directed presence before the roster push
   52: %%  in add_sample_contact/2
   53: %%  TODO: investigate, fix.
   54: 
   55: subscription_tests() -> [unsubscribe,
   56:                          decline_subscription,
   57:                          subscribe].
   58: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   59: %% Init & teardown
   60: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   61: 
   62: 
   63: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   64: 
   65:     MongooseMetrics = [{[data, xmpp, received, xml_stanza_size], changed},
   66:                        {[data, xmpp, sent, xml_stanza_size], changed},
   67:                        {fun roster_odbc_precondition/0, [data, odbc, regular],
   68:                         [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]},
   69:                        {[backends, mod_roster, get_subscription_lists], changed}
   70:                        ],
   71:     [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)].
   72: 
   73: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   74:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   75: 
   76: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   77:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   78: 
   79: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   80:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, [alice, bob]}).
   81: 
   82: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   83:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   84: 
   85: end_per_testcase(add_contact, Config) ->
   86:     [{_, UserSpec} | _] = escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config),
   87:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec),
   88:     escalus:end_per_testcase(add_contact, Config);
   89: end_per_testcase(roster_push, Config) ->
   90:     [{_, UserSpec} | _] = escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config),
   91:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec),
   92:     escalus:end_per_testcase(roster_push, Config);
   93: end_per_testcase(subscribe, Config) ->
   94:     end_rosters_remove(Config);
   95: end_per_testcase(decline_subscription, Config) ->
   96:     end_rosters_remove(Config);
   97: end_per_testcase(unsubscribe, Config) ->
   98:     end_rosters_remove(Config);
   99: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  100:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  101: 
  102: end_rosters_remove(Config) ->
  103:     [{_, UserSpec1}, {_, UserSpec2} | _] =
  104:         escalus_config:get_config(escalus_users, Config),
  105:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec1),
  106:     remove_roster(Config, UserSpec2),
  107:     escalus:end_per_testcase(subscription, Config).
  108: 
  109: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  110: %% Tests
  111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: 
  113: get_roster(ConfigIn) ->
  114:     Metrics =
  115:         [{['_', modRosterGets], 1},
  116:          {[backends, mod_roster, get_roster], changed}
  117:         ],
  118:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, Metrics),
  119: 
  120:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,_Bob) ->
  121:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  122:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  123: 
  124:         end).
  125: 
  126: add_contact(ConfigIn) ->
  127:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modRosterSets], 1}]),
  128: 
  129:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  130: 
  131:         %% add contact
  132:         escalus_client:send(Alice,
  133:                             escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Bob,
  134:                                                               [<<"friends">>],
  135:                                                               <<"Bobby">>)),
  136:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  137:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Received)),
  138:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice)
  139: 
  140:         end).
  141: 
  142: roster_push(ConfigIn) ->
  143:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modRosterSets], 1},
  144:                                          {['_', modRosterPush], 2}]),
  145: 
  146:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
  147: 
  148:         %% add contact
  149:         escalus_client:send(Alice1,
  150:                             escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Bob,
  151:                                                               [<<"friends">>],
  152:                                                               <<"Bobby">>)),
  153:         Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  154:         escalus_client:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Received)),
  155:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
  156: 
  157:         Received2 = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
  158:         escalus_client:send(Alice2, escalus_stanza:iq_result(Received2))
  159: 
  160:         end).
  161: 
  162: 
  163: subscribe(ConfigIn) ->
  164:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modPresenceSubscriptions], 1}]),
  165: 
  166:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  167: 
  168:         %% add contact
  169:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  170: 
  171:         %% subscribe
  172:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  173:         PushReq = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  174:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  175: 
  176:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  177:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  178: 
  179:         %% Bob adds new contact to his roster
  180:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  181:                             escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Alice,
  182:                                                               [<<"enemies">>],
  183:                                                               <<"Alice">>)),
  184:         PushReqB = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  185:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqB)),
  186:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  187: 
  188:         %% Bob sends subscribed presence
  189:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribed">>)),
  190: 
  191:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  192:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
  193: 
  194:         %% Bob receives roster push
  195:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob)
  196: 
  197: 
  198:         end).
  199: 
  200: decline_subscription(ConfigIn) ->
  201:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modPresenceUnsubscriptions], 1}]),
  202: 
  203:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  204: 
  205:         %% add contact
  206:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  207: 
  208:         %% subscribe
  209:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  210:         PushReq = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  211:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  212: 
  213:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  214:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  215: 
  216:         %% Bob refuses subscription
  217:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"unsubscribed">>)),
  218: 
  219:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  220:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2)
  221: 
  222:         end).
  223: 
  224: 
  225: unsubscribe(ConfigIn) ->
  226:     Config = mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, [{['_', modPresenceUnsubscriptions], 1}]),
  227: 
  228:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  229:         %% add contact
  230:         add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob),
  231:         %% subscribe
  232:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"subscribe">>)),
  233:         PushReq = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  234: 
  235:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReq)),
  236: 
  237:         %% Bob receives subscription reqest
  238:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  239:         %% Bob adds new contact to his roster
  240:         escalus_client:send(Bob,
  241:                             escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Alice,
  242:                                                               [<<"enemies">>],
  243:                                                               <<"Alice">>)),
  244:         PushReqB = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  245:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqB)),
  246:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  247: 
  248:         %% Bob sends subscribed presence
  249:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(alice, <<"subscribed">>)),
  250: 
  251:         %% Alice receives subscribed
  252:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2),
  253: 
  254:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  255: 
  256:         %% Bob receives roster push
  257:         PushReqB1 = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  258:         escalus_assert:is_roster_set(PushReqB1),
  259: 
  260:         %% Alice sends unsubscribe
  261:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(bob, <<"unsubscribe">>)),
  262: 
  263:         PushReqA2 = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  264:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(PushReqA2)),
  265: 
  266:         %% Bob receives unsubscribe
  267: 
  268:         escalus_client:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2)
  269: 
  270:     end).
  271: 
  272: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  273: %% Helpers
  274: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  275: 
  276: add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob) ->
  277:     add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob, [<<"friends">>], <<"generic :p name">>).
  278: 
  279: add_sample_contact(Alice, Bob, Groups, Name) ->
  280:     escalus_client:send(Alice,
  281:         escalus_stanza:roster_add_contact(Bob, Groups, Name)),
  282:     RosterPush = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  283:     escalus:assert(is_roster_set, RosterPush),
  284:     escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:iq_result(RosterPush)),
  285:     escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice).
  286: 
  287: 
  288: remove_roster(Config, UserSpec) ->
  289:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
  290:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_roster_odbc, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
  291:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_roster, remove_user, [Username, Server]).
  292: 
  293: mongoose_metrics(ConfigIn, Metrics) ->
  294:     Predefined = proplists:get_value(mongoose_metrics, ConfigIn, []),
  295:     MongooseMetrics = Predefined ++ Metrics,
  296:     [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn].
  297: 
  298: roster_odbc_precondition() ->
  299:     mod_roster_odbc == escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mod_roster_backend, backend, []).
